MARIO Tools Entry Portal

MARIO (Mapping RNA-RNA interactome in vivo) Tools is developed by Zhong Lab at University of California, San Diego to study RNA-RNA interactome and structures in vivo. The work has been accepted in Nature Communications. Please select the version you want below to enter the detailed documentation site.

MARIO v0.4

(Recommended) Latest version in development. Accuracy of the results have been improved, more functionalities have been incorporated and multi-core support is implemented to vastly reduce computational time for large datasets.

MARIO v0.3

Legacy version used in the accepted article in Nature Communications.
